timeline.bodyText:
Would it be better to use a human readable format? i.e.
return formatTimestamp(MAX_PRECISION, epochMicros, picosOfMicro);
timeline.author: electrum

replies.bodyText: It can go either way. For debugging purposes, I've often found it useful to see what the component parts are.
replies.author: martint

replies.bodyText:
It can go either way.

True.
I think human-readable should be fine. picos are visible in human; epoch micros -- you would need to expand the object in a debugger.
replies.author: findepi
